name: allpurposecpq
description: **Steps completed:** 1. Created Maven project with Spring Boot 3.5.7. 2. Configured Java 17 compiler. 3. Changed default server port to `8081` in `application.properties`. 4. Added test REST controller (`/api/hello`). 5. Enabled CORS for frontend (`http://localhost:5173`).

scripts.dev: concurrently -n BACKEND,FRONTEND "cd Backend && ./mvnw spring-boot:run" "cd Frontend && npm run dev"
